name: Harvest Square
description:
As a farmer, you have to plant your crops, but in order to harvest them you have to make a square of the same crops.

Controls: Mouse to drag and drop the crops into the farmlands

Plant the crops and make squares of 3x3 of the same crop.

The bigger the square, more points it gives!

You lose when the new form can't fit in the board.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 52, Theme: Harvest.
